title.label: Good game, but won’t function on my tablet

title.label: Shuts off immediately after opening the app

content.label: I used to play this on my iPad but and I loved the game. And I just downloaded it on my iPhone and it shuts off immediately after opening the app. Can this be fixed? I have an iPhone XS Max.

It says it “works on this iPhone” but NOPE!!! The second I join the game I hear glitch noises and then the game closes. Please fix this because I played this on my kindle years ago but now it does the same thing as my phone (the one I’m using to write this review) but I had sooooo much fun playing it. Leave a like if your depressed 😀👍

My only complaint is that when I received a new phone and reinstalled the game it no longer works. The game will successfully download however every time I click on the app itself it would always glitch out and send me back to my home screen. Please fix this glitch so I can play again! Thank you.

I honestly think this game is what defines the term well-rounded.It's hard enough for an adult to play but let's kids not stress enough about a certain level.The characters are vibrant,the monsters are hilarious,the power-ups are fun to play with, and you can play as a fridge.My only complaint is that when you finish/stop a level, you can't go back to the world you were in, you have to press the "home" button and select the world again.But that's my only complaint about this masterpiece of a game.

title.label: PLEASE RESET MY DATA ON THE GAME!

content.label: Okay, this game is great I have to admit. I got this game about 3 years ago and had it for a while. Then I got to level 50, where I can’t level up any more, so I defeated it. Now here I am downloading this game again, and, I have the same data as last time, and, the levels are so hard that I deleted it (and like I said, u can’t lvl up past lvl 50), thx for reading this. Please make it so I can lvl up past lvl 50, and delete my data so I can learn how to play again, once u guys do this, I will get the game again. #😢🤯😢
